Class Chaser

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Character
          Chaser

public class Chaser
extends Character

Chaser objects move independently around the world in the hope of "catching" the single runner object. The catch occurs when a chaser object occupies the same location as the runner object. Chasers move randomly through the world unless they sense the runner is close by; the runner is within PROXIMITY squares of the chaser. If the runner is close, the chaser then moves purposefully toward the runner.

Version:
2/25/07
Author:
Mikeyg

Method Detail

act

public void act()
Act - If the runner is close by, move towards it, otherwise move in a random fashion. The current implementation has chasers moving without wrap throughout the world. Proximity detection is performed in a non-wrapping manner.
